CustomField.formula: if( ISBLANK( SmartViscaf__lead__c ) , image( "/resource/SmartViscaf__" & $Label.smartviscaf__sb_text_unregisteredicon, $Label.smartviscaf__sb_msg_unregistered ) , HYPERLINK( "/" & SmartViscaf__lead__r.Id , SmartViscaf__lead__r.LastName & " " & SmartViscaf__lead__r.FirstName ) )
CustomField.label: リード
